issue.title: Update gazebo9_ros_pkgs to fix ABI breakage on diff drive plugin

content.raw:
@_jrivero_, where can I see the status of the build? Currently, the set of packages on the repo is broken.

ros-kinetic-gazebo9-dev on xenial has dependencies on gazebo 7, which is wrong. Check http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu/dists/xenial/main/binary-amd64/Packages
